Text:
THANKS A LOT, nikita200! This is a great program, and it's good to get the latest version.
    One question--how do I register? You gave the serial number, but I couldn't find a place to copy/paste it. It seems to only want to find the registration info in your files. Thanks for any help you can give!!

Installed on 5.26.13 on Win XP system & works like a charm! Been using '08 version because I didnt like the first platform change a year or so ago but this one rocks! Strongly recommend & thanks Nikita200!
